segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink—water everywhere from the overflowing faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, oblivious, polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she slips on that puddle, it could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are going to get soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids— that boy is way up on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to grab cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting eagerly with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the stool tips and he falls onto the wet floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting water damage, streaming down the doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter, but this mess could ruin them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids look so innocent, but this is dangerous play.
segments.speaker: PAR
